/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, houses and buildings can be seen, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
